summary.description: > VERY_LOW CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'titled', 'morphometric', 'olive', 'EVOOs' | High Biodiversity Arises from the Analyses of Morphometric, Biochemical and Genetic Data in Ancient Olive Trees of South of Italy | Multivariate analysis of data and geographic display of results | OliveR is an R package containing a shiny application that provides a vast series of statistical tools for exploring and analyzing both quantitative (such as morphometric or biochemical) and genetic data that can be associated to geographical coordinates. Through the use of shapefiles, the application allows visualizing both data and results of a statistical analysis directly on a geographical basis
summary.name: OliveR
